Summary: my friend and i both saw an object in flames crashing into the mountins north of magalia, it did not look like any meteor i have ever seen. the flames were green!!!
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Magalia
There were no other sightings in Magalia on or around March 6th 2012
divs: Sighting Details my friend and i were comeing back from paradice and we were passing the resevior and we both noticed a bright light and looked up north of magalia, there was a fastly decending object into the north mountains of magalia. it was split into three objects that had two smaller peaces in the front and one larger object behind it. i of course thought a meteorite, but it looked bigger then or the same as a 747 if put together, and i am shure i would have noticed the impact in some way or another, and also it had a slightly green aura that kinda creeped me out. i would love some follow up to this, i am kind of a sceptic, but i will be looking for it to hit the news. it was def not identified by my friend or i.
